plot: John Betjeman muses on the origins of his poetry in a bomb-scarred London, and performs some of his work.
title: Poet's London
plot_es: John Betjeman muses on the origins of his poetry in a bomb-scarred London, and performs some of his work.
plot_en: John Betjeman muses on the origins of his poetry in a bomb-scarred London, and performs some of his work.
